welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vechta, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic buildings, and vibrant culture. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Varrelbusch Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Varrelbusch Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bremen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bremen Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
